content: उपभोगः {@--1@} ({%a%}) Enjoyment, eating, tasting; न जातु कामः कामानामुपभोगेन शाम्यति <ls>Ms. 2. 94</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">8. 285</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 171.</ls> काम° <ls>Bg. 16. 11</ls>; प्रियोपभोग <ls>R. 12. 22.</ls> ({%b%}) Use, application; चरणोपभोगसुलभः <ls>Ś. 4. 4.</ls> {@--2@} Enjoyment (of a woman), cohabitation; <ls>R. 14. 24.</ls> {@--3@} Usufruct. {@--4@} Pleasure, satisfaction.
